original_text: King of Assyria, the people who keep your people safe are asleep. Also, your powerful men are lying down to rest. Your people have run away to the mountains with nobody to get them together.
korean_text: 앗수르 왕이여 네 목자가 자고 네 귀족은 누워 쉬며 네 백성은 산들에 흩어지나 그들을 모을 사람이 없도다

sentences.original_text: King of Assyria, the people who keep your people safe are asleep.
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 왕이시여, 당신의 백성을 지키는 사람들이 잠들어 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Also, your powerful men are lying down to rest.
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 당신의 강력한 사람들이 쉬려고 누워 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: Your people have run away to the mountains
with nobody to get them together.
